TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscreteInt16KeyFrame extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame

summary.span: 使用离散内插，从上一个关键帧的 值动画处理到其自身的 。

span.span: Animates from the value of the previous key frame to its own using discrete interpolation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用作的一部分结合要进行动画处理根据一组关键帧的属性值。This class is used as part of a in conjunction with a to animate a property value along a set of key frames. 关键帧定义的一个段它所属。A key frame defines a segment of the to which it belongs. 每个关键帧都有一个目标和。Each key frame has a target and a . 指定的时间关键帧的应到达。The specifies the time at which the key frame's should be reached. 关键帧动画应用到其自己的目标值的上一个关键帧的目标值。A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value. 它将启动时上一个关键帧结束，并在达到其自己的关键时间时结束。It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached. 之类的离散的关键帧突变""值 （无内插）。Discrete key frames like create sudden "jumps" between values (no interpolation). 换而言之，才到达关键帧的关键时间，在哪个点的属性的基值突然达到目标值，也会发生变化的属性的基值。In other words, the animated property does not change until the key frame's key time is reached, at which point the animated property goes suddenly to the target value. ## Examples 动画的内插对动画在其持续时间内在值之间进行过渡的方式进行了描述。An animation's interpolation describes how an animation transitions between values over its duration. 通过选择动画要使用哪种关键帧类型，可以定义该关键帧段的内插方法。By selecting which key frame type you use with your animation, you can define the interpolation method for that key frame segment. 有三种不同类型的内插方法：线性、离散和曲线。There are three different types of interpolation methods: linear, discrete, and splined. 此示例使用为了演示这些内插类型。This example uses a to demonstrate these interpolation types. 下面的示例使用每个可用的不同内插方法类进行动画处理的位置。The following example uses each of the different interpolation methods available to the class to animate the position of a . 1. 在第一个三秒内，使用的是实例类将沿路径矩形以恒定速率从它的起始位置到 500 的位置。During the first three seconds, uses an instance of the class to move the rectangle along a path at a steady rate from its starting position to the 500 position. 之类的线性的关键帧创建平滑的值之间的线性转换。Linear key frames like create a smooth linear transition between values. 2. 在第四个第二个结束时，使用的是实例类突然移动到下一个位置的矩形。At the end of the fourth second, uses an instance of the class to suddenly move the rectangle to the next position. 之类的离散的关键帧突变值。Discrete key frames like create sudden jumps between values. 在该示例中，矩形位于起始位置，然后突然出现在 500 位置。In this example, the rectangle is at the starting position and then suddenly appears at the 500 position. 3. 在最后两秒内，使用的实例类将矩形移回其起始位置。In the final two seconds, uses an instance of the class to move the rectangle back to its starting position. 之类的样条关键帧创建变量的值根据值之间转换属性。Spline key frames like create a variable transition between values according to the value of the property. 在此示例中，在该矩形先是缓慢移动，然后加速指数级增长的时间段的末尾In this example, the rectangle begins by moving slowly and then speeds up exponentially toward the end of the time segment [!code-csharp[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/CSharp/AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.cs#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] [!code-vb[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/visualbasic/altdoubleanimationusingkeyframesexample.vb#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] [!code-xaml[keyframes_snip#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_snip/XAML/AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.xaml#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)] 不是每个\<类型 > AnimationUsingKeyFrames 类支持所有内插方法。Not every \AnimationUsingKeyFrames class supports all interpolation methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关键帧动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md).

span.span: The ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.

param.name: keyTime

span.span: The key time for the key frame.

param.span: 关键时间确定达到目标值的时间，同时也是关键帧结束的时间。

span.span: The key time determines when the target value is reached, which is also when the key frame ends.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Freezable CreateInstanceCore() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateInstanceCore () As Freezable
protected override short InterpolateValueCore (short baseValue, double keyFrameProgress);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance int16 InterpolateValueCore(int16 baseValue, float64 keyFrameProgress) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function InterpolateValueCore (baseValue As Short, keyFrameProgress As Double) As Short
protected: override short InterpolateValueCore(short baseValue, double keyFrameProgress);

param.name: keyFrameProgress
param.span: 一个介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值，该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

span.span: A value from 0.0 through 1.0 that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.

summary.span: 使用离散内插可在前一个关键帧值和当前关键帧的值之间进行切换。

span.span: Uses discrete interpolation to transition between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame.

returns.span: 给定了指定基值和进度时此关键帧的输出值。

span.span: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
